title: Super Galaxy Gnar recall bug
body:
Whenever you recall on Super Galaxy Gnar, the Gnar sound effects (the "Ha-ha-haa," not the bug sounds and the blaster sounds) can be heard anywhere on the map. Even if you're looking in the fog of war (as the SUper Galaxy Gnar) you can still hear it, and my teamates have told me that they can hear me recalling too.

Its a nice ass skin tho, I love it.
